page.title: 04The Orchard _ Great Clacton
page.content: Behind our house there was a wood. All the children used to play there for hours making dens to play in during the holidays and after school. Children used to go to school through the wood because the school estate is linked to our estate by it. Now Richards Walk has been made there is only one entrance.A few weeks ago the entrance was fenced up and there is a big{Keep Out}sign. Some children say the wood is haunted by a ghost. They say it is an army general from the second world war. They say he was patrolling the area in a jeep when it was blown up. A couple of months ago a few of us went to have a look around and we saw the remains of an old jeep. Somewhere in the wood there is the remains of a German bomber. My friends and I had a look for it but could not find it.
